CONTRACT_ID: But W2023-R002F/A Amendment 01 is issued to post questions and answers 1 to 5.
short_summary: Rail transportation services are required to facilitate rail movements of oversized military equipment
description: This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is the first phase of a procurement process led by the Department of National Defense (DND) for this rail transportation requirement. Respondents are invited to prequalify in accordance with the terms and conditions of this ITQ.
